review: Much better than my Chromecast. Pros include:Loads quickly;Seldom buffers or skips due to its greater RAM;Has yet to get stuck in "loading" which my Chromecast did often;Includes mini remote plus I can I use my Android tablet and my Kindle Fire 6 to replace the remote;Extremely easy set up; and,Very good assortment of channels to watch (like Netflix, Hulu PLUS, History, Smithsonian, YouTube, PBS, Defense, and more).I am very happy with the Fire Stick and highly recommend it over the Chromecast.
